HTMLElementUl.summary: The <ul> HTML element represents an unordered list of items, typically rendered as a bulleted list.

remarks.para:
-Other list-related HTML Elements: ol, li, menu
-CSS properties that may be specially useful to style the <ul> element:-the list-style property, to choose the way the ordinal displays.
-CSS counters, to handle complex nested lists.
-the line-height property, to simulate the deprecated compact attribute.
-the margin property, to control the list indentation.
